mapper.insert: insert into Reply (re_no, mid, sg_no, re_content) values (seq_re_no.nextval, #{mid}, #{sg_no}, #{re_content})
insert into Reply (re_no, mid, sb_no, re_content) values (seq_re_no.nextval, #{mid}, #{sb_no}, #{re_content})
mapper.select: select * from Reply where sg_no=#{sg_no} order by re_no desc
select * from Reply where sb_no=#{sb_no} order by re_no desc
mapper.update: update Reply set re_content=#{re_content} where re_no=#{re_no}
